nodes.Name: Bitcoin BTC
nodes.Details: Bitcoin is a decentralized digital currency without a central bank or single administrator. It can be sent from user to user on the peer-to-peer bitcoin network without the need for intermediaries. Transactions are verified by network nodes through cryptography and recorded in a public distributed ledger called a blockchain. The cryptocurrency was invented in 2008 by an unknown person or group of people using the name Satoshi Nakamoto. Its implementation was released as open-source software in 2009 and began to be used then.
nodes.Significant Events: Aug 25, 2017 - Bitcoin mainnet upgraded to support Segregated Witness

nodes.Name: Ethereum ETH
nodes.Description: The first blockchain with smart contract functionality
nodes.Details: Ethereum is the first decentralized, open-source blockchain with smart contract functionality. It was initially described in a white paper by Vitalik Buterin in late 2013 and launched in 2015. This network serves as the foundation for an ecosystem of interoperable, decentralized applications (dApps) powered by token economies and automated smart contracts. Assets and applications designed on Ethereum are built with self-executing smart contracts that eliminate the need for a central authority or intermediary.  The network is powered by its native cryptocurrency ether (ETH), which is used to pay transaction fees. Ethereum has the characteristics of being open-source, programmable, private, and censorship-resistant, forming the backbone of a decentralized internet.
nodes.Funders: Vitalik Buterin, Joseph Lubin, Amir Chetrit, Mihai Alisie, Charles Hoskinson, Anthony Di Iorio, Fenbushi Capital
nodes.Team Members: Vitalik Buterin (Founder), Joseph Lubin (Co-Founder), Amir Chetrit (Co-Founder), Mihai Alisie (Co-Founder), Charles Hoskinson (Co-Founder), Anthony Di Iorio (Co-Founder)
nodes.Significant Events: May, 2015 - Ethereum raised $ 500 K in funding round

nodes.Name: Litecoin LTC
nodes.Description: P2P digital currency for online payments
nodes.Details: Litecoin is a peer-to-peer digital currency for online payments. It is a global payment network that is fully decentralized, without any central authorities. Mathematics secures the network and gives individuals the power to control their own finances. Litecoin has faster transaction confirmation times and improved storage efficiency than the leading math-based currency. With strong industry support, trade volume and liquidity, Litecoin is a proven medium of commerce that complements Bitcoin.
nodes.Significant Events: Oct 13, 2011 - Litecoin was live on mainnet

nodes.Name: Solana SOL
nodes.Official Links: https://solana.com/, https://x.com/solana, https://t.me/solana, https://github.com/solana-labs, https://solana.com/solana-whitepaper.pdf, https://medium.com/solana-labs, https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/solana/, https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/solana, https://forums.solana.com/, https://defillama.com/chain/Solana
nodes.Details: Solana is a high-performance blockchain protocol designed to enable scalable, user-friendly applications for the world.
nodes.Funders: Anatoly Yakovenko, Lily Liu, Raj Gokal, Austin Federa, Ben Sparango, Divya Agarwalla, Matt Sorg, Alexander Kehaya, Emmett Hollyer, Andreessen Horowitz, Polychain, Multicoin Capital, CMS Holdings, Delphi Digital, NGC Ventures, 1kx, Placeholder, Zee Prime Capital, Blockchange Ventures, GenBlock Capital, Ryze Labs, BlockTower Capital, Jump Trading, Big Brain Holdings, Reciprocal Ventures, TrueX, Compute Labs, Borderless Capital
nodes.Team Members: Anatoly Yakovenko (Co-Founder and CEO), Lily Liu (Foundation Chairman), Raj Gokal (Co-Founder), Austin Federa (Head of Strategy), Ben Sparango (Head of BD), Divya Agarwalla (Head of Product), Matt Sorg (VP of Technology), Alexander Kehaya (Network Infrastructure Lead), Emmett Hollyer (General Manager)

nodes.Name: Decred DCR
nodes.Official Links: https://decred.org/, https://x.com/decredproject, https://t.me/decred, https://github.com/decred/decrediton, https://docs.decred.org/, https://medium.com/decred, https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/decred/, https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/decred, https://forum.decred.org/
nodes.Details: Decred is a hybrid proof-of-work and proof-of-stake (PoW/PoS) cryptocurrency that prioritizes community input, open governance, and sustainable funding for development. Its hybrid consensus and on-chain governance systems ensure that no single group can control the flow of transactions or make changes to Decred without the input of the community.

nodes.Name: Bitcoin SV BSV
nodes.Details: Bitcoin SV is a hard fork of Bitcoin Cash, which prioritizes strict adherence to the original Bitcoin client created by Satoshi Nakamoto. It believes that low-cost peer-to-peer transactions are the core value of the network, and is committed to increasing block sizes and on-chain transaction throughput to achieve this goal.
nodes.Significant Events: Nov, 2018 - Bitcoin SV was live on mainnet
